name: Santa Goldberg Machine
description:
Game loads on a black screen. This is intended.
After the game loads, to leave the title screen and enter the game, drag the red present onto the green pipe

Santa's production line is broken! Help fix it by creating machines to transfer the parcels! A short five-level physics game. Made for the Happy New Year 2022-2023 Jam.

Use your mouse to drag blocks into place, and then press go! The goal is to lift the purple parcel using the force of the blue parcel  (they can only be lifted in go mode!). There is cheese, but it is (kind of) intended as a way to relieve frustration :]

Music by xDeveruchi (https://xdeviruchi.itch.io/8-bit-fantasy-adventure-music-pack)

All code and art by KamikaziGhost.

Subscribe to my youtube channel! (https://www.youtube.com/@kittykazi)
